overview.en: OnGO’s ultimate top notch product “Spring”, is a state-of-the-art marketplace and launchpad platform for entrepreneurs seeking to build innovative crypto products tailored towards a wide demographic, ranging from the likes of an absolute novice to the most seasoned crypto professional.Currently Spring places a focused priority within the realms of GameFi, DeFi, & EduFi. We believe that these three aspects of crypto will allow for a fully inclusive understanding of where the crypto space is headed. One of our ultimate missions is to thoroughly educate our users so that they are well versed on how to truly own their assets while also being privileged to favourable governance rights and opportunities within OnGO.Furthermore, OnGO places its mission on building out products that our global society actually requires. We are proud to say that we function as a tech company that places its users and their experiences at the forefront of all of our most important decisions.
